#include<iostream>
#define MAX 1000000007
using namespace std;
typedef unsigned long long int ull;
unsigned long long int F[1000001];

ull bigMod(ull  a, ull  b, ull c) {
    if (a == 0 || b == 0) {
        return 0;
    }
    if (a == 1) {
        return b%c;
    }
    if (b == 1) {
        return a%c;
    } 
ull a2;
    
     a2 = bigMod(a, b / 2, c);

    if ((b & 1) == 0) {
        return (a2 + a2) % c;
    } else {
        
        return ((a % c) + (a2 + a2)) % c;
    }
}

int main()
{
    unsigned long long int t,a,b,r,i,s1,s2;
    unsigned long long int sum;
    cin>>t;
    F[0]=0;
    F[1]=1;
    for(i=2;i<=1000001;i++)
    F[i]=(F[i-1]%MAX+F[i-2]%MAX)%MAX;
    while(t--)
    {
              cin>>a>>b>>r;
              if(r==1)
              cout<<a<<endl;
              else if(r==2)
              cout<<b<<endl;
              else
              {
                  //cout<<F[r-1]<<" "<<F[r-2]<<endl;
                  s1=bigMod(F[r-2],a,MAX);
                  s2=bigMod(F[r-1],b,MAX);
                  sum=((s1%MAX)+(s2%MAX))%MAX;
                  cout<<sum<<endl;
                  }
              }
              return 0;
    }
